DOC.brief_summary: In investigator-initiated study , compare change brain cognitive biomarkers assess diffusion tensor image 2.5 year among 12 patient Idiopathic Parkinson 's disease ( IPD ) receive rasagiline , 20 IPD patient receive MAO-B inhibitor 25 age-matched healthy control . Will also compare change Mini-Mental State Exam ( MMSE ) Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) score plasma brain-derived neurotrophic factor ( BDNF ) change brain cognitive biomarkers IPD patient HC 2.5 year .
DOC.brief_title: Effect 2.5 Years Rasagiline Therapy Progression Cognitive Biomarkers Assessed MRI Parkinson 's Disease .
DOC.criteria: IPD HC subject enrol similar study 2.5 year ago Baseline DTI data available .
